verbs.description: Special counsel Robert Mueller 's investigators [V: are] turning their sites on President Donald Trump 's inaugural fundraising haul – with a focus on donors tied to Russia and the Middle East .

[ARG0: Special counsel Robert Mueller 's investigators] are [V: turning] [ARG1: their sites] [ARGM-DIR: on President Donald Trump 's inaugural fundraising haul] – [ARGM-MNR: with a focus on donors tied to Russia and the Middle East] .

Special counsel Robert Mueller 's investigators are turning their sites on President Donald Trump 's inaugural fundraising haul – with a focus on [ARG1: donors] [V: tied] [ARG2: to Russia and the Middle East] .
